dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.control.RevenueAssuranceApplicability
dataStructure.description:
The time of day or days during which a RevenueAssuranceObjective or RevenueAssuranceConsequence is relevant or not.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceApplicability

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which an applicability is known and distinguished from other RevenueAssuranceApplicabilities.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail what the applicability is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: _un_applicableCode
child.description:
Indicator that specifies whether an instance represents applicability or un-applicability.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _un_applicableCode

child.name: _un_applicableDuring
child.description:
A period of time representing applicability or un-applicability. For example, from 8AM to 12PM.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _un_applicableDuring

child.name: _un_applicableDays
child.description:
A day or days representing applicability or un-applicability. For example 2, 3 represents Monday and Tuesday.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _un_applicableDays

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time during which the applicability is in force.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: revenueAssuranceParameter
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association RevenueAssuranceParameterImpactedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: revenueAssuranceParameter

child.name: revenueAssuranceAssessmentItem
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association RevenueAssuranceApplicabilityEvaluatedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: revenueAssuranceAssessmentItem

child.name: revenueAssuranceConsequence
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association RevenueAssuranceConsequenceImpactedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: revenueAssuranceConsequence

child.name: revenueAssuranceObjective
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association RevenueAssuranceObjectiveImpactedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: revenueAssuranceObjective
